Header.title: Small Farm big Ideas
Header.paragraph: Technological advancement has created more opportunities for farmers to develop profitable businesses. In this article, we have listed some profitable business ideas that you can start on your own.

About.paragraph: Our Farm is an award winning pumpkin patch and produce farm owned and operated by the Golub family. Located just outside of Syracuse in Manlius, New York.

Features.title: Green-Vegetables
Features.text: Leafy green vegetables are an important part of a healthy diet. Theyâ€™re packed with vitamins, minerals and fiber but low in calories.The dark greens supply a significant amount of folate, a B vitamin that promotes heart health and helps prevent certain birth defects.

Features.title: Dairy
Features.text: Dairy products or milk products, also known as lacticinia, are food products made from milk. The most common dairy animals are cow, water buffalo, nanny goat, and ewe. Dairy products include common grocery store food items in the Western world such as yogurt, cheese and butter.

Features.title: Fruits
Features.text: A diet rich in vegetables and fruits can lower blood pressure, reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke, prevent some types of cancer, lower risk of eye and digestive problems, and have a positive effect upon blood sugar, which can help keep appetite in check.
